description: "Racism is evil," said Trump. "And those who cause violence in its name are criminals and thugs, including the [Ku Klux Klan], neo-Nazis, white supremacists and other hate groups that are repugnant to everything we hold dear as Americans."
maintext: "Racism is evil," said Trump. "And those who cause violence in its name are criminals and thugs, including the [Ku Klux Klan], neo-Nazis, white supremacists and other hate groups that are repugnant to everything we hold dear as Americans."
title: Trump condemns 'repugnant' hate groups, including KKK, neo-Nazis
